name: Creepy Run
description:
A runner game where you play with your super_powered character who can throw fireballs and make fire storms . It is endless as you go through 4 different environments (Jungle,Dessert,Beach,Snow) . You have to dodge the zoombies running towards you from every direction or just burn them with your superpowers BUT WATCH YOUR STAMINA BAR as you use your skills your stamina decrease but don't worry you can find health and stamina pickups.

Controls:

A : Left  , D : Right , Space Bar : Jump , Right Click : Fire storm , Left Click : Fire ball.

*The game is under development and more features will be coming soon*
